0101001001110011 1101000001010101 0 -> sum: 0010001011001000, cout: 1
0001100001000101 0000101110100111 0 -> sum: 0010001111101100, cout: 0
0011000111001010 1000101100110000 0 -> sum: 1011110011111010, cout: 0
0111010001001110 1011101100000111 1 -> sum: 0010111101010110, cout: 1
1111110001011101 1011101100000111 0 -> sum: 1011011101100100, cout: 1
1100011111110111 0111001010110001 1 -> sum: 0011101010101001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
